column4: but laptop drivers are normally provided by the selling company
like, for my laptop i have a fire gl 128
and i cant download dirvers anywhere but IBM
now i need to learn how to play mp3's and .avi files
anyone have a direction they want to send me in?
I'd say decide on a player (I suggest vlc and xine and gmplayer), and then read about the RestrictedFormats :)
can you check your pm please?
i installed vlc.. how do i run it? :\
And it's also in Applications -> Sound & Video
you need to sudo, and you might want to try fdisk -l
